description: crouching girl in profile at L, with dark hair, leaning her forehead against the forehead of a dog in profile at R; vessel-like shape above girl's head, connected to her head with an uneven line
provenance: (Van Straatan Gallery, Chicago); First Bank System, Minneapolis, until 1997; U.S. Bancorp, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 2003.
signed: Signed in pencil, LRC: [S. CARNWATH  AUG. 1984]
title: Thought Transfer
